title: Walking in Your Girl Power -Tapping into your Leader Within
desc: This workshop is designed for girls ages 12-17, to show them how to become leaders in life, not by chance but by choice. ?Phenomemal Girls Do Phenomenal Things Program founder is on a misssion to build a community of powerful young women who are pursuing life with all intentions of being successful. Through various workshops addressing topics to motivate young women to elevate their thinking to a level of greatness, has proven to be a fundamental resource for them as they journey through their school years as tweens/teens into womanhood. ?Young ladeies that attend our workshops leave with a warrior spirit and conqueror drive, knowing that through self belief in their potential they can accomplish anything they set their mind out to do. We hope all your Phenomenal Girls will be in attendance this will be another awesome workshop not to be missed.
